titleStmt.title: By the Queene. A proclamation for the restitution of thentercourse betwixt the kingdomes, countreys, and subiectes of the Queenes maiestie and the king of Spayne
Proclamations. 1573-04-30
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churcheyarde by Richarde Iugge, printer to the Queenes Maiestie,
